VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Azure Enclave. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(11 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1987, 1988, 1991, 1993, 1996, 1998, 2001, 2003, 2006, 2008, 2011}.
